name: Miss Pingu
description: Miss Pingu was a very good penguin mother... Until the day the ice broke and all of her eggs were scattered around. To make things worse, the evil polar bears, brought to a nearby science facility by crazy scientists (obviously!) managed to escape. They might never have tried penguin, but the odds are they will love it. Help her to rescue the next generation by shifting tiles and tides in this Slide Puzzle.
